strapiPost.title: New Boutique Candle Shop Opens In Rogers
strapiPost.content:
What started as a quarantine hobby has turned into a new business venture with a store front in Downtown Rogers.

  • Smells: The Little Candle of NWA is owned by two locals, a husband and wife duo, who make uniquely scented soy candles, small batch soaps and lotions, and offer candle making classes.
  • Discount: The NWA candle collection, among others, has specific candles for each of the big NWA cities and other regional staples. Starting today until Feb. 14, you can use the code NWADAILY at checkout and receive 15% off your order!

Shop The Little Candle of NWA HERE.
